website_summaries.verdict: Despite carrying a low profile, the Reebok Work Leelap does not need to look flashy for one to know its features. Fulfilling the essential qualities that users usually require for sneakers, these are comfortable, lightweight and stylish. Beyond that, its function as a steel toe work shoe works great especially for those who need it or those who merely want their feet protected.
pros: A significant percentage of users find that these are a great alternative to the heavy steel toe cleats as these are unique, comfortable and extremely lightweight
According to a reviewer, the insides of the Reebok Work Leelap are nicely padded
This sneaker by Reebok is relatively easy to clean, according to one tester
This model from the Reeboks Classics collection is comfortable to wear according to a lot of reviewers
In fact, those that are on their feet the whole day notice that these are the perfect companion for their lifestyle
Aside from its style, numerous consumers, especially those that are working in a more hazardous environment, enjoy its function of acting as safety shoes
One who is required to wear steel toe shoes every day cannot find one that is durable enough to last more than six months
He seems happy to see one that fits his requirements
These sneakers are breathable and keep the feet fresh throughout the day, others note
The reflective side stripes add a delightful accent on the shoe because it acts as a safety feature especially for people working in low light conditions
cons: The heel part could use more arch support, one of the wearers have said
The shoe is concaved which causes chaffing on the ankles especially when paired with low-cut socks
A shopper wishes that there are more color and non-suede options for this model
A high number of testers find the material harder and not as soft and flexible as the other Reeboks that they are used to

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work, im a mechanic at a dealership and i was tired of wearing boots everyday. The shoes kinda look like an 85 year old man should be using them to shuffle around town and pick up his meds, however they do perform as described. Its a weird looking tennis shoe with a steel toe. The horizontal white stripe that is pictured is blue on the shoes that arrived wich is dissapointing but at this point i welcome any further awkwardness that this shoe can offer. I almost wish they had velcro straps. The fit is a touch big but like i said earlier, they are work shoes and theyre more comfortable than boots.
customer_reviews.author: Max98506

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: I don't dislike them, but they aren't anything to write home about. I work outside a lot in the middle easy and these make my feet super hot and they are a bit heavy for what they are. My feet don't do well in these after a full day outside. Maybe if I worked in a warehouse setting they would be better. I'd recommend them to someone who works inside and only a few times a day actually requires safety shoes. I'm going back to my Keen's and won't be purchasing another pair of Reeboks.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel S.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted me quite long for its price
customer_reviews.text: Shoe has lasted longer than any sub $80 shoe I've purchased in the past. Almost 3 years later the Achilles area is pretty worn but soles still have a bit of tread, could be due to the loose way i wear them. But it has withstood air craft carrier surfaces, hydrolic oil, water, and alot of running (I'm usually late for work, that brisk jog isn't too hard on the feet either). Good shoe I definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Color Scheme. False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are not what the pic says. They are a totally different color scheme. The reebok logo is not the same making them look like pumas. I also wear a size nine and ordered a size 8 due too all the reviews saying to do so. The size 8 is a bit snug but that could possibly be from the insoles I put it, should have got an 8.5. Since they are only for work, I decided to keep them and not send them back due to the false advertising of the color. Over all they serve their purpose and a fairly comfortable. Would have given 4-5 stars if the color were correct and the size more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: dbeau716

customer_reviews.title: Nice Little Work Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These are some awesome work shoes / wear around all day kinda shoe. The size is about a half size big. Best way to compare I'd say is I wear a size 8 in Chuck Taylors, size 9 in Pumas, and size 8.5 in Nikes and Adidas. I ordered these at size 8.5 and an 8 would of probably been a better fit. I'm not to concerned though because they still fit very well with no slippage. Another thing i've noticed is the back arch support on the shoe where in concaves in can dig at your ankles if you wear low cut socks.
customer_reviews.author: Higgy

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes! Just get the right size.
customer_reviews.text: Short and sweet. I'm a size 9, according to reviews they recommended to buy a size smaller so I got a size 8. Therefore I choose the somewhat large option. The fit ended up perfect, but a little too perfect. A little too snug at the toes where my toe next to the pinky toes, (ring toe?) feels slightly cramped. Nonetheless I'm very happy with the purchase. Didn't feel the need to return them. I am flat footed so I got some insoles for extra comfort. If I do purchase again I may try to get them wide style or maybe a half a size bigger to give my toes some wiggle room.
customer_reviews.author: Walter C

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this shoe at first, it was fairly comfortable and i liked the look. I do a lot of walking at work 5-10 miles a day, and I've had these shoes for almost 5 months and they are completely worn out. I always add insoles to shoes for more comfort. But insoles arent helping. The inside of the shoe is coming undone and torn up. The toe of the shoes are coming unstitched. The reflective part on the sides are peeling off in patches. They are wearing uneven as well. I dont recommend these for long lasting shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Kstaley

customer_reviews.title: Not cutting it
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are lighter than steel toe boots. That's the best thing about them. I found the insoles they came with to be uncomfortable so I replaced them with dr scholl's work insoles and that was fixed. However they really don't breathe well at all. I've had them only five months and they've already started to stink. I wore my old leather steel toe doc martens for seven years and they never started to smell like these. I'm definitely in the market for some different steel toe shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Beal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good Work Footwear!
customer_reviews.text: These were bought for a grandson as he had to have Steel Toed shoes to wear at work. He loves them and says they are very comfortable with the work he does. He has had other Leelap footwear and really liked them. Therefore he thought in the steel toed shoes he would be happy and he is. Will buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Missouri G-Ma

customer_reviews.title: ☹️
customer_reviews.text: These were advertised as slip resistant, which was a big fat negatory. Whoever came up with that has never worked in an industrial area. The make of the shoe are sturdy but the souls wore out very quickly. For the money and a quick fix til I could buy my regular boots for work they were good.
customer_reviews.author: steven watkins

customer_reviews.title: runs slightly large
customer_reviews.text: These are a little larger in person than they look in the photos, kind of like skate shoes. With that said, they are comfortable and I wear them for 9-10 hours per day without any issues. They definitely run a little large as other reviews had mentioned, luckily I went down a half size so they fit me well. The stripes on the side are somewhat reflective which could be a nice safety bonus if you work in any low light conditions. Overall very decent shoes especially at this price point. They have held up for a few weeks of constant wear for me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable. I like wearing them because they are stylish and also protects my foot from warehouse dropping hazard that causes injuries to the foot, and leaving painful bruises. Also prevents stubbing toe injuries. The shoes are very dark and navy, and almost black. Some places require steel toe, but this is recommended if your work place is enforcing everyone to wear steel toe boots. My work place doesn't require steel toe, but I wear it because it is important to prevent injuries.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe and look amazing but it's more like a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe and look amazing but it's more like a walk around type shoe not very good if your in the delivery side and your jumping in and out of your truck and for example if you deliver products to stores and use a hand truck or dolly the shoe is very slippery and hard to pull your hand truck away from your product. Overall that downside the shoe is 100% amazing and delivery was fast and reliable as promised!
customer_reviews.author: GlockXclusive

customer_reviews.title: These can’t be made by Reebok
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time believing these shoes are made by Reebok. The toe box is barely covered in some thin material and within a second of putting your feet in them they are rubbing your foot. Right back in the box they go.
customer_reviews.author: Power Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Real work shoes.
customer_reviews.text: As stated only detractor is slightly over sized but I like thick socks so it's ok for me. This is my first steel toed work shoe.. really a shoe boot hybrid. Quality is better than any sketches work shoe.! I've gone through several of them junk. As for comfort they feel pretty much like old school circa 70s 80s sneakers. The steel toe is no joke also the sued is reinforced. The sole looks weird but it works well in the warehouse or out in the woods.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Jeffords

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is falling apart after a month of light wear. The glued sole is coming off and this is the second pair now that this is happening to. I would not recommend. Fix this Reebok!
customer_reviews.author: StevenCody

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Got them yesterday. Wore them to work didn’t even feel like the where steel toe. Light weight and comfortable. I am on my feet 8 to 12 hours a day and walk a lot at work I will be ordering more of these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: A.K. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: 100% as expected
customer_reviews.text: The are not too big , they look like normal Reebok sneakers. I suggest you to select the W,EE ones. Yes, order them 1sz smaller. I'm usually 10 and the sz9 fits on me perfectly. The look awesome with skinny jeans! Update:07-30-2017 These are not slip resistant at all. I really don't care nor need it but I just found out.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Good looking steel toe tennis shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes do the trick for meeting steel toes requirements. I was looking for something low profile... these are necessary low profile, they are HUGE! But I knew that they were going to be Frankenstein shoes before I bought them. Very comfortable. Two weeks after buying the Reeboks I was at a Wal-Mart and found a pair of steel toe tennis sheos for $17! Those actually resemble normal sized tennis shoes, so I wear them more than the Reeboks, but the Reeboks are much more comfortable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: M.R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These were great and my husband loved them until the 25 day of use when they started talking. Really sad that these fell apart this way. My husband must use steel toes for work and his sock/boot tan is annoying him so he wanted shoes he could wear. Disappointed to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williams

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoes, but very low quality. Stitches are torn, and sole is dislodging. And all this after 45 days of use. Cannot return, because return period is over.
customer_reviews.author: Kakhramon

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just odd fit
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, it just fits a little odd, hard to really explain,.. kinda feels like my feet just kind of 'roll' in them, maybe because of the lack of arch support and shaplessness of the sole. But it does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.author: Jimmychanga

customer_reviews.title: THE SUPPORT OF THE SHOE
customer_reviews.text: At first , he didn't like it because the shoe is heavy. But then AGAIN ITS CALLED A STEEL TOE FOR A REASON. HE TRIED IT ON, AND NOW LOVES IT!!. HE CANT WAIT TO USE IT TOMORROW AT WORK. WEARING THE PROPER REQUIREMENTS
customer_reviews.author: Sofaea

customer_reviews.title: Dont right 4 me
customer_reviews.text: Not made well ... not comfortable... i only worn them in house ... to try to see if i could handle wearing them at work still are brand new
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Soles are very slippery on the floors where i work .
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers are fine but the soles say they are oil resisting slip resisting , they are not its like i have a pair of ice skates on , i almost slipped and fell many times. I work around coolant and oil sometimes on the floor. I have had many steel toe shoes on my feet in the 25yrs that i have worked there. I have never had anything like this.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best thing about the shoes is the looks. It's about as heavy or slightly less heavy than a steeltoe work boot. Runs a bit roomy in the toes due to the cap. But they are comfortable and easy to walk in.
customer_reviews.author: EJ

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I would like to know why these shoes didn't come with comfort insoles. I get compliments on them all the time. My other Reeboks have them. This is plaguing my mind.
customer_reviews.author: Scruples

customer_reviews.title: Definitely larger, so order a full size down
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 9.5 usually so I ordered the 9 thinking it would be ok. It’s way too large. Looks almost cartoony. I will send them back n get an 8.5.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Vila

customer_reviews.title: A nice yearly shoe. Replace it yearly.
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice shoe just don't expect it to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Geno Ocean

customer_reviews.title: ... this for my husband and he says they are great. He is a lot more comfortable being on ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband and he says they are great. He is a lot more comfortable being on his feet for 10 hours. The reason I took off a star was that the picture of what is shown was different from what I got. But other than that it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: First name brand
customer_reviews.text: I've never been able to buy a name brand shoe before, So this was my real first purchase of one. it's exactly what I needed, my feet still hurt, but it's less than it was, thank you reebok, you've won me over.
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I have wore these shoes all of 2 days. My feet hurt so bad. I'm highly disappointed. I've wasted my money
customer_reviews.author: Andreia

customer_reviews.title: Not for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: I had to bail after walking around my living room for ten steps. The cap was just jammed against the outside of my big toe. Shame, I was hoping for something lighter than boots for the job site.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Not the reebok i remember.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is good, but they're not the most durable of outers. The stitches broke before the soles even wore in. Pictures is a month later, worn 5x a week, in the shipping department of a sign fabrication shop. I had similar shoes as a child that lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Audrie Goff

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable safety shoes.  Different than the regular steel toe boots usually worn at work.
customer_reviews.text: My husband really liked these shoes. His co-workers commented on them being unique and others wanted to get similar safety shoes. He said they are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MrsM

customer_reviews.title: Feet of an angel
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about the fit after reading other reviews but these fit me the same as my converse. The most comfortable steel toe ever! I worked in a factory where steel toes were required but mostly redundant. Boots were not necessary and definitely overkill. I bought these, threw some cushions in them and my feet felt wonderful after 12 hour days of pacing around on hard concrete floors. Amazing purchase!
customer_reviews.author: That guy mike

customer_reviews.title: Steel toe
customer_reviews.text: In the looks department, the are top notch. Wearing them is ok. I am still getting used to wearing a steel toe. I have never had to wear one before so the protective toe rubs in different places than a regular shoe does. I wear them for about 5 hours and then switch. I'm sure when my feet get used to them I will be able to wear them longer.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Christensen

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run big. Not a very good quality. The soles are coming unglued. The soles have worn down extremely fast. I am very disappointed with the shoes. Should have saved my money and bought another pair of the Ariat workhogz!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M Garza

customer_reviews.title: awesome steel toes and look great
customer_reviews.text: It's been a requirement for me to wear steel toe at My job of 11 years. Best steel toe shoes I've ever owned but run a little big so buy like a half size smaller than normal. I've tried many types and brands and these are the best so far.very lightweight and comfortable.Thinking about buying another pair for the future when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: snicklefritz

customer_reviews.title: Like them
customer_reviews.text: This item was exactly as I expected. It is well made and I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Mumphord

customer_reviews.title: To large
customer_reviews.text: For 10.5 it's to large. Quality looks ok. But how they look when you tight it to fit good - I don't like.
customer_reviews.author: Kyryl

customer_reviews.title: Size 9 fits him better. He bought these because he's a mechanic/sales & ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is size 9.5 -- ordered these shoes in 9.5 & they were about 1 inch too long!! Able to return the shoes & get a smaller size. Size 9 fits him better. He bought these because he's a mechanic/sales & is always running around. Kind of interesting these shoes are steel toe, you never wouldve thought! A bit heavy, but hey! they're steel toe...
customer_reviews.author: amendoza

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but fell apart quick
customer_reviews.text: The sole began to part from the shoe after about 3 weeks of wear. It is a comfortable shoe but that shouldn't happen after only 3 weeks. Update: do not order this shoe. After less than 3 months they are completely falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Heist

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this steel toe shoes perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: CHI TOWN

customer_reviews.title: But I really don't like wearing boots
customer_reviews.text: I have to wear a safety toe at work. But I really don't like wearing boots. Admittedly, I added a gel insole...but I'm a big guy and I do that to almost all my shoes. I love these enough that I'm considering buying the other color options in the same size.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Way too big.
customer_reviews.text: All of my other Reeboks are size 11 and fit perfectly. These are way too large. I don't know if I should go down a half size or a whole size. There is that much extra room in them.
customer_reviews.author: jtothed

customer_reviews.title: They are stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I thought they would run big as the other steel toe sneakers in the market but these run true to size. They are stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Keila Montanez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size too large on accident, but I decided to try to make it work. I bought some insoles at Walmart and stuck them in the shoe and it fit much better. There wasn't much arch support which is why i needed the insoles, but the lightness is enough to want to buy this shoe again once these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bosse

customer_reviews.title: steel toed yes, oil and slip not so much
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these for work I needed steel toes and didn't want some crappy walmart boots, so I researched and found these... extreme comfort and reliability at $70 well worth the price for what they do, although a little disappointed that they say "oil and slip resistant" on the shoe but they slip and slid on tile so not sure how that works
customer_reviews.author: Jordan H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and this item is a very comfortable work shoe.
customer_reviews.author: willie alston III

customer_reviews.title: ** Real review **Uncomfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could write a good review about these shoes . There extremely uncomfortable. I had to put different soles in them. That only helped alittle. Im a little guy (130), my foot is narrow . I don't think that makes a difference in Comfort tho
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe. Enough cushion in the sole to keep ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Enough cushion in the sole to keep my feet from hurting after spending 10-12 hours on a concrete floor.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: These look great and the heavy steel toe seems safe
customer_reviews.text: These look great and the heavy steel toe seems safe, but they are not the go-to shoe for every single day. They look a lot better than my other safety shoes, but are not quite as comfortable. I would buy them again, but not as my only pair of safety shoes (required for work)
customer_reviews.author: Nisha

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Work shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of shoes. My husband thinks they are too nice for work shoes! He wears them all day, everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Abigail McAuley

customer_reviews.title: Happy feet
customer_reviews.text: My husband said it feels like walking on air. Perfect for the 12-14 hour shifts at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I use to have a great deal of discomfort after work, which requires me standing and walking most of the day on concrete. Since wearing these shoes, the pain is significantly lower. I'm happy I bought them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm a size 9 and ordered a 9EW. Fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paolo

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair totally different on my feet ??
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bought were very good excellent but the second pair I bought they hurt my feet I don’t know what it is it’s the same shoe but I can’t wear the second pair
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great item, altought the one I receive has not ...
customer_reviews.text: Great item, altought the one I receive has not the line in reflective which cross the two lines. It it in blue as the main color of the shoes. They are very comfortable and fits as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: They kill your feet!
customer_reviews.text: They look like Reebok classics.. however they are by far the worst shoes I’ve ever purchased for work in my life! My feet are so unbelievably sore! I wouldn’t recommend these shoes for a job that requires a lot of standing and walking. 👎
customer_reviews.author: Marcus & Marissa

customer_reviews.title: best steel toes shoes I have ever wear ,its like regular reebok classic
customer_reviews.text: My regular size is 11 but I was reading the reviews before ordering and olive saw I lot of people complaining and saying that this comes larger that the size so I order a 10 1/2 still little bigger that my size but fits good.. if you ordering this order 1 size less than your regular size.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Almanzar

customer_reviews.title: Not as heavy as a work boot
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my husband. He said they were fine for light duty.
customer_reviews.author: Gertrude V. Allen

customer_reviews.title: A work shoe that doesn’t look like a work shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I would get a pair in another color if it was available. That’s how much I like them
customer_reviews.author: Darvius L. Catron

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and nice looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is very comfortable. Wide Around the toes you won't feel like your wearing steal toes. I wear size 10 I should of gotten a size 10 instead of 11 didn't need the extra size like the other steal toes boots out there. Nice looking too on the feet
customer_reviews.author: jerome earl

customer_reviews.title: Wear to fast.
customer_reviews.text: Good but wear out to fast. Lasted me about 3 months. Bottoms coming apart. Won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Hmm

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on a ice rink. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: They claim to be slip resistant and oil resistant, but theses are absolutely not slip resistant. They slip with slightest amount of oil, water, or coolant on the ground. They are potentially unsafe on a painted surface
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and not heavy
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes I have bought a few pairs over the years, work 8 hours fast-walking,. And they are not heavy. Always get 1/2 size larger I'm a 8.5 I buy 9 so they fit comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Shadowjb93

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for heavy ass work boots.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Bought these as a replacement to heavy and clunky work boots. After work foot pain and aching has gone away as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Good for sitting around or driving machinery. Wouldn't recommend for order selecting or fast paced work. Still have and still use, overall comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these work shoes mainly for the old style Reebok logo. The picture of the shoes when I ordered showed a shoe with three white stripes, the shoe I received had two white stripes and a blue stripe. Not a big deal unless you are buying a product online based on a picture that is supposed to represent the exact thing being sold.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: I'M TOO SEXY FOR MY JOB
customer_reviews.text: The laces are blue not black but that can be easyly fixed, I look sexy af wearing them I think I just might used them for a casual look instead of taking them to work, I wish there were more color options and also a non suede option but defetnetly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos R.

customer_reviews.title: awesome shoe
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and looks like a standard gym shoe the only reason I deducted a star was they are a bit larger than I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: M Neid

customer_reviews.title: I wear in between 9 1/2 and 10 so I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear in between 9 1/2 and 10 so I ordered size 9 1/2. It was a little long, but they are to wide. Also after two months of wearing them the soles on the bottom are starting to come off. On one it's 1/4 of the way unglued.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for factory work
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the best, I’ve gotten them twice now for my fiancé and he loves them. They fit true to size and are very comfortable, along with the fact that they have a steel toe, these shoes are definitely a great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other than that these Reebox are pretty dope. I almost don't want to wear them ...
customer_reviews.text: All I knew was that I was a size 12. I didn't know what the "U" was or the "M", with that being said they are a little bit large. Other than that these Reebox are pretty dope. I almost don't want to wear them to work. they are very clean and very comfortable. I would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It is comfy compare to my other pair of steel toe shoes. One star off for the bulkiness look. They are significantly bulkier than regular tennis shoes. I guess you have to compromise because of the steel toes.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the feeling of the shoe, the only negative is that the shoes feels to heavy.
customer_reviews.author: omar

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit as it should. Much more comfortable than even my daily driver shoes! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great Steel-Toe Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These steel-toe shoes are perfect for my work at IKEA. Holding up well so far after 1 month of use. Only complaint is that the product isn't exactly as advertised: one of the reebok stripes on the side of the shoe is navy and not white as shown in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking shoes got lots of compliments bt not that comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker great fit I got a size smaller then ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker great fit I got a size smaller then regular size and it fits perfectly. Time to wear them at work tonight and run for the money. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Scrappy Ignatius

customer_reviews.title: Love them I work 12 hours and I can do ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them I work 12 hours and I can do it in these. boots was killing my feet now I have hope and my company end up paying be back for them so I am happy on both parts
customer_reviews.author: dontaye dollarhide

customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband for work n he works 12 hour shifts 5-6 days a week n he loves them n says they r really comfortable. The item was received on time n the price ain't bad either. Would buy another pair

customer_reviews.text: not truly oil slip resistant I felt like I was on rice skates first time I wore them in the pro kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Michael Weldon

customer_reviews.title: The steel toe took some getting used to (About three ...
customer_reviews.text: The steel toe took some getting used to (About three days of wear.) The insoles need replacing after about a month or two (kept riding up the back of my heal, felt weird until readjustment) Still ticking however 6 months later. In tact in warehouse environment. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dwiggs36

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Alternative to Safety Boots!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. They're much lighter than my work boots and look great. I've had to prove to my supervisor that these were steel toe a couple of times because he thought that I came to work in regular sneakers, lol! The leather is of course much thinner than on works boots but I've yet to have a single tear. I bought a half-size smaller than I usually wear based on Amazon's suggestion and am glad I did because they fit great with some wiggle-room, still. The blue from the leather runs a little bit into the white by the sole but only a little. I would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Richard A.

customer_reviews.title: One of the better work shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, not too big but the pair I got seem a little wide. Not complaining, I'm on my feet alot so it's good that when I put these on, I forget about them being a work shoe.
customer_reviews.author: G James

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: They were a gift and the person loved them. Used them for work.
customer_reviews.author: Skyegirl

customer_reviews.title: way better then my redwings!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable It feels like im wearing regular sneakers. i work at tesla and am on me feet 10-12 shifts 5 to 6 days a week. my redwings were killing me every day, and they were twice as much as these reebox. you need to get these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Shoe is extremely too fat I really a waisted my money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steel toe slip resistant shoe that looks like a street shoe and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Slightly bigger than I expected, this is fine for me. The shoes look bigger than I expected, which also is fine. They're comfortable and meet my works requirements. The sides are reflective which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: shoes didnt last 6 months and wore out fast shoe was uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes But Bad Fit!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the shoes wide and my toes are constantly rubbing against the steel toed portion which makes for a very uncomfortable wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah

customer_reviews.title: BUY YOUR REAL SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: ORDER YOUR REAL SIZE. I listened to these dumb people and ordered a half size smaller. My toes were touching the steel. I bought some thin gel insoles and thinner shoe string and that done the job. They feel AWESOME if u walk a lot. Not so awesome if you stand in one spot for hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Blake

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: For work this is a gamechanger i used to use steel toe boots which weighed like a house at the end of my shift but this helps not fully but helps with the pain i having before
customer_reviews.author: Henry L

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking work shoe. Steel toed tennis shoe really. Comfortable and great fit. After a week can already feel the difference from my old boots. Shipped fast and on time.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Lusk

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit. Upsize for comformt
customer_reviews.text: Its snug fit. For comfort, i recommend to upsize. At least, 1 size bigger. Overall, love this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Norhisyam

customer_reviews.title: Great & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my boyfriend for work and he absolutely loves them. I would definitely buy another pair when this one has to retire. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Nibs

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit great and are comfortable. However, as another reviewer stated. What you receive is NOT what is pictured. The reebok stripe is not white it's reflective and the small white swipe coming from the laces is BLUE! DOES NOT LOOK LIKE REEBOK LOGO AT ALL.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice work shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband got these for work and really likes them. They run a little big, he went with a half size smaller than his regular shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: K
